### Regional reports 


```{r generate-region-reports, include = FALSE}
regions <- EpiNow::get_regions(here::here(file.path(path, "nowcast/results")))
show_title <- TRUE
title_depth <- 4

region_summaries <- 1:length(regions) %>% 
  purrr::map(function(region_index) {
    index <- region_index
    region <- regions[region_index]
    region_name <- names(regions)[region_index]
    out <- knitr::knit_child(here::here("templates/_region-report.Rmd"), envir = environment()) 
  })
```


```{r print-region-reports, results="asis"}
cat(paste(region_summaries, collapse = '\n'))
```
